title: She Caught Her Friends' Wives Doing *WHAT*?!
description:
Our listener is in the middle of a dilemma that could possibly ruin two marriages. Recently she caught two of the wives in her friend group KISSING one another!
She has no idea why or if their husbands know. But she feels weird being around them and doesn't know how to handle this situation. Any advice?
